channel.title: Npc Max hit help
channel.description: how do i change the max hit of a monster - eg rat lvl 1 hits 99?

item.title: Npc Max hit help
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

That doesn’t work, or at least it doesn’t work on Delta base. Besides, on certain sources you can’t change a monsters level unless it’s in client, and I’ve yet to see a server that you can change their level server-side.

Back the point at hand, I don’t think changing the level makes much difference besides scaring certain people, like I set one of my NPC’s to a level 500 named “King of Death”, he could already hit decent but I’d like him to hit higher of course.

I’ve tried finding guides but no dice, if I find one I’ll be sure to let people know the link.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Max hit help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

The only way I know of is to change their combat level.

Read full topic
